name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Software Developer with 8 years of experience in building scalable and reliable applications. Proficient in **CI/CD** processes and version control using **GitLab**, ensuring seamless deployment and integration. Skilled in **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Redis**, enabling robust data storage and retrieval solutions. Proven expertise in **microservices** architecture and containerization using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, facilitating efficient application management and orchestration.

I excel in unit, module, and integration testing, ensuring high-quality code and maintaining standards of excellence. A strong problem solver with excellent communication skills, I possess a solid understanding of software development principles that drive successful collaboration within teams.

In addition to my technical strengths, I have experience in building high-performance solutions across healthcare and financial sectors using **Java**, **Kotlin**, **JavaScript/TypeScript**, and **Python**, with frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have also led projects integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation, utilizing cloud services **Azure** and **AWS** to deliver enterprise-grade applications.
